title: New IEA report highlights coal as the fuel of choice for Southeast Asia (World Coal ...
text: ( Source : World Coal Association ) The International Energy Agency ( IEA ) released last week the Southeast Energy Asia Outlook 2015 . The report highlights that the power sector is fundamental to the energy outlook for Southeast Asia and that
